Movie_Cast: Preity Zinta, Shah Rukh Khan, Saif Ali Khan, Jaya Bachchan

Movie_Cast: Andy Lau, Tony Chiu-Wai Leung, Anthony Chau-Sang Wong, Eric Tsang
Movie_Des: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.

Movie_Cast: Ewan McGregor, Albert Finney, Billy Crudup, Jessica Lange
Movie_Des: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

Movie_Cast: Tae-Hyun Cha, Jun Ji-hyun, In-mun Kim, Song Wok-suk
Movie_Des: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

Movie_Cast: Nicole Kidman, Paul Bettany, Lauren Bacall, Harriet Andersson
Movie_Des: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado community in exchange for labor, but when a search visits the town she finds out that their support has a price.

Movie_Cast: Yilmaz Erdogan, Demet Akbag, Altan Erkekli, Cem Yilmaz
Movie_Des: Lives of residents in a small, Anatolian village change when television is introduced to them.

Movie_Cast: Jake Gyllenhaal, Jena Malone, Mary McDonnell, Holmes Osborne
Movie_Des: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

Movie_Cast: Tom Cruise, Jason Robards, Julianne Moore, Philip Seymour Hoffman
Movie_Des: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

Movie_Cast: Björk, Catherine Deneuve, David Morse, Peter Stormare
Movie_Des: An Eastern European US immigrant with a love for musicals has to cope with the gradual loss of her vision.

Movie_Cast: Richard Farnsworth, Sissy Spacek, Jane Galloway Heitz, Joseph A. Carpenter
Movie_Des: An old man makes a long journey by lawnmower to mend his relationship with an ill brother.

Movie_Cast: Junko Iwao, Rica Matsumoto, Shinpachi Tsuji, Masaaki Ôkura
Movie_Des: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

Movie_Cast: Fernanda Montenegro, Vinícius de Oliveira, Marília Pêra, Soia Lira
Movie_Des: The emotive journey of a former schoolteacher who writes letters for illiterate people, and a young boy whose mother has just died, as they search for the father he never knew.

Movie_Cast: Tim Roth, Pruitt Taylor Vince, Mélanie Thierry, Bill Nunn
Movie_Des: A baby boy, discovered in 1900 on an ocean liner, grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.

Movie_Cast: Bajram Severdzan, Srdjan 'Zika' Todorovic, Branka Katic, Florijan Ajdini
Movie_Des: Matko and his son Zare live on the banks of the Danube river and get by through hustling and basically doing anything to make a living. In order to pay off a business debt Matko agrees to marry off Zare to the sister of a local gangster.

Movie_Cast: Billy Bob Thornton, Dwight Yoakam, J.T. Walsh, John Ritter
Movie_Des: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

Movie_Cast: Timothy Spall, Brenda Blethyn, Phyllis Logan, Claire Rushbrook
Movie_Des: Following the death of her adoptive parents, a successful young black optometrist establishes contact with her biological mother -- a lonely white factory worker living in poverty in East London.

Movie_Cast: Bruce Willis, Madeleine Stowe, Brad Pitt, Joseph Melito
Movie_Des: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

Movie_Cast: Brigitte Lin, Takeshi Kaneshiro, Tony Chiu-Wai Leung, Faye Wong
Movie_Des: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal waitress at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

Movie_Cast: Danny Elfman, Chris Sarandon, Catherine O'Hara, William Hickey
Movie_Des: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

Movie_Cast: Al Pacino, Chris O'Donnell, James Rebhorn, Gabrielle Anwar
Movie_Des: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

Movie_Cast: Kevin Costner, Gary Oldman, Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau
Movie_Des: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

Movie_Cast: Dustin Hoffman, Tom Cruise, Valeria Golino, Gerald R. Molen
Movie_Des: After a selfish L.A. yuppie learns his estranged father left a fortune to an autistic savant brother in Ohio that he didn't know existed, he absconds with his brother and sets out across the country, hoping to gain a larger inheritance.

Movie_Cast: Mitsuo Iwata, Nozomu Sasaki, Mami Koyama, Tesshô Genda
Movie_Des: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

Movie_Cast: Cary Elwes, Mandy Patinkin, Robin Wright, Chris Sarandon
Movie_Des: While homesick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

Movie_Cast: Bruno Ganz, Solveig Dommartin, Otto Sander, Curt Bois
Movie_Des: An angel tires of his purely ethereal life of merely overseeing the human activity of Berlin's residents, and longs for the tangible joys of physical existence when he falls in love with a mortal.

Movie_Cast: Gaspard Manesse, Raphael Fejtö, Francine Racette, Stanislas Carré de Malberg
Movie_Des: A French boarding school run by priests seems to be a haven from World War II until a new student arrives. Occupying the next bed in the dormitory to the top student in his class, the two young boys begin to form a bond.

Movie_Cast: Mayumi Tanaka, Keiko Yokozawa, Kotoe Hatsui, Minori Terada
Movie_Des: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

Movie_Cast: Sumi Shimamoto, Mahito Tsujimura, Hisako Kyôda, Gorô Naya
Movie_Des: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

Movie_Cast: Oleg Yankovskiy, Erland Josephson, Domiziana Giordano, Patrizia Terreno
Movie_Des: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy researching the life of an 18th-century composer, and instead meet a ruminative madman who tells the poet how the world may be saved.

Movie_Cast: Peter Billingsley, Melinda Dillon, Darren McGavin, Scott Schwartz
Movie_Des: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher and Santa that a Red Ryder BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

Movie_Cast: Bob Geldof, Christine Hargreaves, James Laurenson, Eleanor David
Movie_Des: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

Movie_Cast: Klaus Kinski, Claudia Cardinale, José Lewgoy, Miguel Ángel Fuentes
Movie_Des: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.

Movie_Cast: Peter Sellers, Shirley MacLaine, Melvyn Douglas, Jack Warden
Movie_Des: After the death of his employer forces him out of the only home he's ever known, a simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful tycoon and an insider in Washington politics.

Movie_Cast: Woody Allen, Diane Keaton, Tony Roberts, Carol Kane
Movie_Des: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.

Movie_Cast: Al Pacino, John Cazale, Penelope Allen, Sully Boyar
Movie_Des: Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

Movie_Cast: Margarita Terekhova, Filipp Yankovskiy, Ignat Daniltsev, Oleg Yankovskiy
Movie_Des: A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.

Movie_Cast: Gene Wilder, Madeline Kahn, Marty Feldman, Peter Boyle
Movie_Des: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that his grandfather was not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

Movie_Cast: Steve McQueen, Dustin Hoffman, Victor Jory, Don Gordon
Movie_Des: A French convict in the 1930s befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence in the South American penal colony on Devil's Island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

Movie_Cast: Harriet Andersson, Liv Ullmann, Kari Sylwan, Ingrid Thulin
Movie_Des: When a woman dying of cancer in early twentieth-century Sweden is visited by her two sisters, long-repressed feelings between the siblings rise to the surface.

Movie_Cast: Natalya Bondarchuk, Donatas Banionis, Jüri Järvet, Vladislav Dvorzhetskiy
Movie_Des: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

Movie_Cast: Laurence Olivier, Michael Caine, Alec Cawthorne, John Matthews
Movie_Des: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.

Movie_Cast: Timothy Bottoms, Jeff Bridges, Cybill Shepherd, Ben Johnson
Movie_Des: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

Movie_Cast: Topol, Norma Crane, Leonard Frey, Molly Picon
Movie_Des: In pre-revolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant with traditional values contends with marrying off three of his daughters with modern romantic ideals while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

Movie_Cast: George C. Scott, Karl Malden, Stephen Young, Michael Strong
Movie_Des: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.

Movie_Name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
Movie_Cast: Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Katharine Ross, Strother Martin
Movie_Des: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

Movie_Cast: Mia Farrow, John Cassavetes, Ruth Gordon, Sidney Blackmer
Movie_Des: A young couple trying for a baby move into an aging, ornate apartment building on Central Park West, but find themselves surrounded by peculiar neighbors.

Movie_Cast: Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter, Maurice Evans
Movie_Des: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a planet in the distant future where intelligent talking apes are the dominant species, and humans are the oppressed and enslaved.

Movie_Cast: Alain Delon, François Périer, Nathalie Delon, Cathy Rosier
Movie_Des: After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

Movie_Name: In the Heat of the Night
Movie_Cast: Sidney Poitier, Rod Steiger, Warren Oates, Lee Grant
Movie_Des: A black Philadelphia police detective is mistakenly suspected of a local murder while passing through a racially hostile Mississippi town, and after being cleared is reluctantly asked by the police chief to investigate the case.

Movie_Cast: Dustin Hoffman, Anne Bancroft, Katharine Ross, William Daniels
Movie_Des: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

Movie_Cast: Elizabeth Taylor, Richard Burton, George Segal, Sandy Dennis
Movie_Des: A bitter, aging couple, with the help of alcohol, use their young houseguests to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other over the course of a distressing night.

Movie_Cast: Omar Sharif, Julie Christie, Geraldine Chaplin, Rod Steiger
Movie_Des: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

Movie_Cast: Marcello Mastroianni, Anouk Aimée, Claudia Cardinale, Sandra Milo
Movie_Des: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.

Movie_Cast: Silvia Pinal, Jacqueline Andere, Enrique Rambal, José Baviera
Movie_Des: The guests at an upper-class dinner party find themselves unable to leave.

Movie_Name: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
Movie_Cast: Bette Davis, Joan Crawford, Victor Buono, Wesley Addy
Movie_Des: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

Movie_Cast: Toshirô Mifune, Tatsuya Nakadai, Keiju Kobayashi, Yûnosuke Itô
Movie_Des: A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen trying to save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.

Movie_Cast: Nikolay Burlyaev, Valentin Zubkov, Evgeniy Zharikov, Stepan Krylov
Movie_Des: During WWII, Soviet orphan Ivan Bondarev strikes up a friendship with three sympathetic Soviet officers while working as a scout behind the German lines.

Movie_Cast: Paul Newman, Jackie Gleason, Piper Laurie, George C. Scott
Movie_Des: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

Movie_Cast: Marcello Mastroianni, Anita Ekberg, Anouk Aimée, Yvonne Furneaux
Movie_Des: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering tabloid journalist living in Rome.

Movie_Cast: John Wayne, Dean Martin, Ricky Nelson, Angie Dickinson
Movie_Des: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Movie_Cast: James Stewart, Lee Remick, Ben Gazzara, Arthur O'Connell
Movie_Des: An upstate Michigan lawyer defends a soldier who claims he killed an innkeeper due to temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?

Movie_Cast: Charlton Heston, Orson Welles, Janet Leigh, Joseph Calleia
Movie_Des: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

Movie_Name: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
Movie_Cast: Elizabeth Taylor, Paul Newman, Burl Ives, Jack Carson
Movie_Des: Brick is an alcoholic ex-football player who drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife. A reunion with his terminal father jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.

Movie_Cast: Burt Lancaster, Tony Curtis, Susan Harrison, Martin Milner
Movie_Des: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

Movie_Cast: Sterling Hayden, Coleen Gray, Vince Edwards, Jay C. Flippen
Movie_Des: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

Movie_Cast: Robert Mitchum, Shelley Winters, Lillian Gish, James Gleason
Movie_Des: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

Movie_Cast: Anthony Quinn, Giulietta Masina, Richard Basehart, Aldo Silvani
Movie_Des: A care-free girl is sold to a traveling entertainer, consequently enduring physical and emotional pain along the way.

Movie_Cast: William Holden, Don Taylor, Otto Preminger, Robert Strauss
Movie_Des: After two Americans are killed while escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

Movie_Cast: Gregory Peck, Audrey Hepburn, Eddie Albert, Hartley Power
Movie_Des: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

Movie_Cast: Gary Cooper, Grace Kelly, Thomas Mitchell, Lloyd Bridges
Movie_Des: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon when the gang leader, an outlaw he sent up years ago, arrives on the noon train.

Movie_Cast: Vivien Leigh, Marlon Brando, Kim Hunter, Karl Malden
Movie_Des: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

Movie_Cast: Dennis Price, Alec Guinness, Valerie Hobson, Joan Greenwood
Movie_Des: A distant poor relative of the Duke D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.

Movie_Cast: James Stewart, John Dall, Farley Granger, Dick Hogan
Movie_Des: Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling their former classmate to death.

Movie_Cast: Robert Mitchum, Jane Greer, Kirk Douglas, Rhonda Fleming
Movie_Des: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses and duplicitous dames.

Movie_Cast: Anna Magnani, Aldo Fabrizi, Marcello Pagliero, Vito Annichiarico
Movie_Des: During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the Resistance leader, Giorgio Manfredi, is chased by the Nazis as he seeks refuge and a way to escape.

Movie_Cast: Celia Johnson, Trevor Howard, Stanley Holloway, Joyce Carey
Movie_Des: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

Movie_Cast: Humphrey Bogart, Mary Astor, Gladys George, Peter Lorre
Movie_Des: San Francisco private detective Sam Spade takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette, with the stakes rising after his partner is murdered.

Movie_Cast: Marcel Dalio, Nora Gregor, Paulette Dubost, Mila Parély
Movie_Des: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

Movie_Cast: Aleksandr Antonov, Vladimir Barskiy, Grigoriy Aleksandrov, Ivan Bobrov
Movie_Des: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

Movie_Cast: Werner Krauss, Conrad Veidt, Friedrich Feher, Lil Dagover
Movie_Des: Hypnotist Dr. Caligari uses a somnambulist, Cesare, to commit murders.

Movie_Cast: Daniel Craig, Chris Evans, Ana de Armas, Jamie Lee Curtis
Movie_Des: A detective investigates the death of the patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

Movie_Cast: Lily Franky, Sakura Andô, Kirin Kiki, Mayu Matsuoka
Movie_Des: A family of small-time crooks take in a child they find outside in the cold.

Movie_Cast: Adam Driver, Scarlett Johansson, Julia Greer, Azhy Robertson
Movie_Des: Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

Movie_Cast: Irrfan Khan, Saba Qamar, Dishita Sehgal, Deepak Dobriyal
Movie_Des: A couple from Chandni Chowk aspire to give their daughter the best education and thus be a part of and accepted by the elite of Delhi.

Movie_Cast: Armie Hammer, Timothée Chalamet, Michael Stuhlbarg, Amira Casar
Movie_Des: In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.

Movie_Cast: Dave Johns, Hayley Squires, Sharon Percy, Briana Shann
Movie_Des: After surviving a heart-attack, a 59-year-old carpenter must fight bureaucratic forces to receive Employment and Support Allowance.

Movie_Cast: Ferdia Walsh-Peelo, Aidan Gillen, Maria Doyle Kennedy, Jack Reynor
Movie_Des: A boy growing up in Dublin during the 1980s escapes his strained family life by starting a band to impress the mysterious girl he likes.

Movie_Cast: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett, Mark Ruffalo
Movie_Des: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

Movie_Cast: Jake Gyllenhaal, Rene Russo, Bill Paxton, Riz Ahmed
Movie_Des: When Louis Bloom, a con man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.

Movie_Cast: Roman Griffin Davis, Thomasin McKenzie, Scarlett Johansson, Taika Waititi
Movie_Des: A young German boy in the Hitler Youth whose hero and imaginary friend is the country's dictator is shocked to discover that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

Movie_Cast: Jacob Tremblay, Owen Wilson, Izabela Vidovic, Julia Roberts
Movie_Des: Based on the New York Times bestseller, this movie tells the incredibly inspiring and heartwarming story of August Pullman, a boy with facial differences who enters the fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time.

Movie_Cast: Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker, Michael Stuhlbarg
Movie_Des: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

Movie_Name: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
Movie_Cast: Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Oscar Isaac, Domhnall Gleeson
Movie_Des: As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace.

Movie_Cast: Ranveer Singh, Alia Bhatt, Siddhant Chaturvedi, Vijay Raaz
Movie_Des: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

Movie_Cast: Brie Larson, Frantz Turner, John Gallagher Jr., Kaitlyn Dever
Movie_Des: A 20-something supervising staff member of a residential treatment facility navigates the troubled waters of that world alongside her co-worker and longtime boyfriend.

Movie_Cast: Iko Uwais, Yayan Ruhian, Arifin Putra, Oka Antara
Movie_Des: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.

Movie_Cast: Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick, Ariane Labed
Movie_Des: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.

Movie_Cast: Sridevi, Adil Hussain, Mehdi Nebbou, Priya Anand
Movie_Des: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter every day because of her inability to speak and understand English.

Movie_Cast: Muhammet Uzuner, Yilmaz Erdogan, Taner Birsel, Ahmet Mümtaz Taylan
Movie_Des: A group of men set out in search of a dead body in the Anatolian steppes.

Movie_Cast: Jean Dujardin, Bérénice Bejo, John Goodman, James Cromwell
Movie_Des: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.
